title: rotcoD

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you kill a Town member, your ability is replaced by a 2 use heal (powerful defense)
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__ - If part of the DSF, the first attribute does not apply.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Town.

desc:
Post 4820
*I guess that's one way to use a medkit...*
Abilities
- Reverse heal your target, dealing a basic attack and roleblocking them.
